characteristics.name: Description
characteristics.value: If your army is Battle-forged, all INFANTRY, BIKERS and HELBRUTE units in an IRON WARRIORS Detachment gain the following ability: Enemy units attacked by units with this trait do not gain any bonus to their saving throws for being in cover. In addition, you can re-roll failed wound rolls for units with this trait when they target a BUILDING.

profiles.name: Siege Lords
profiles.book: Codex Heretic Astartes - Chaos Space Marines
